refnamediv.refpurpose: Asks the MySQL server to reload the grant tables.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Asks the MySQL server to reload the grant tables. The connected user must have the RELOAD privilege.
This function is deprecated. It is preferable to use mysql_query to issue an SQL FLUSH PRIVILEGES statement instead.

listitem.para: Zero for success. Nonzero if an error occurred.
CR_COMMANDS_OUT_OF_SYNC Commands were executed in an improper order.
CR_SERVER_GONE_ERROR The MySQL server has gone away.
CR_SERVER_LOST The connection to the server was lost during the query.
